#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
       int t,n,m,s,p,q,equal,i,pos1,pos2;
	   scanf("%d",&t);
	   while(t--)
	   {
	   	     equal=0;
	   	     scanf("%d%d%d%d%d",&n,&m,&s,&p,&q);
	   	     	pos1=1;
	   	     	pos2=1;
	   	     	for(i=0;i<s;i++)
	   	     	{
	   	     		pos1+=p;
	   	     		pos2+=q;
	   	     		if((pos1>=m)&&(pos2>=m)&&(pos1-pos2)%(n-m+1)==0)
	   	     		equal++;
	   	     	//	printf("pos1=%d,pos2=%d\n",pos1,pos2);
	   	     	}
	   	     	printf("%d\n",equal);
	   }	
}
